diff_analysis.evidence: The patch replaces uses of Object.create(null) with plain object literals ({}). This makes the idx structure and its nested domain/path maps inherit from Object.prototype. If any cookie.domain, cookie.path, or cookie.key values can be influenced to be '__proto__', 'constructor', or similar, writes like this.idx[cookie.domain][cookie.path][cookie.key] = cookie can modify Object.prototype, enabling prototype pollution (CWE-1321).
